oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Leather wallet of Lt. William Houston Harris
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This leather wallet belonged to 1st Lt. William Houston Harris, Co. I, 7th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA, of Wilson County, Tenn. His name is written within the wallet, as are labels for notes, papers and bills. Harris served under Brig. Gen Robert Hatton. He fought the entire war in Virginia under Gen. Stonewall Jackson and Gen. Robert E. Lee. He was born May 6, 1830 in Gladeville, Wilson County, and died Aug. 2, 1918 in Humboldt, Tenn.
